listing_company_name: LJ Hooker Property Partners - Sunnybank Hills and Mount Gravatt
description:
Living in the suburbs doesn't have to mean sacrificing on a connection to Mother Nature. This spacious family home enjoys an elevated position in a peaceful cul-de-sac, near bird-filled forests and minutes by foot to public transport plus only a moment's drive to the Gateway Motorway for coastal escapes. Enjoy a peaceful walk to the beautiful Maynard Place Park or Persse Road Park.

Five of its finest:
- The massive master has air conditioning, a fan, an ensuite with dual vanity, a walk-in-robe and built-ins
- Four generous bedrooms - all with carpets, ceiling fans and built-ins. There is also three bathrooms: two upstairs and one downstairs
- Open-plan living areas plus sound-proof office/media room
- Ideal north-facing block, above flood levels
- Multiple air conditioners for all-season comfort, insulated roof and NBN installed

While carpet keeps the rumpus cosy, large format floor tiles span the high-traffic kitchen, family room and dining area. Opening to the backyard, this air-conditioned communal space will become your main living zone.

On-trend, two-toned cabinetry ramps up the style factor in the well-proportioned kitchen, which is fitted with a stainless-steel oven, rangehood and dishwasher, an electric stove and dual sink. The laundry runs from here and offers excellent additional storage.

What escalates this property above others are the many extra touches. Here you'll find two bathtubs (one in the master ensuite and the second in the family bathroom), elegant Plantation shutters, and a magnificent stone retaining wall: a stunning backdrop to gatherings on the lawned rear yard.

For families looking to establish roots in the south, this really is the perfect pocket. Nature abounds, yet you're still only a short drive to Runcorn Heights State School and Runcorn State High, Sunnybank Hills Shoppingtown, and access onto the Gateway.

Christmas is coming. Will you celebrate your first one here? Call Karl today.

We are committed to the health and safety of our customers and staff, and their families. When entering a premises please adhere to all social distancing (2m2 apart for spaces less that 200m2 and 4m2 apart for spaces more than 200m2) and strict hygiene requirements. Please also ensure that you follow social distancing measures and keep 1.5m away from each other.

All information contained herein is gathered from sources we consider to be reliable. However we can not guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided and interested parties must solely rely on their own enquiries.
